job.title: Data Engineer  - Remote Position
job.description: pAs a Data Engineer you will work in coordination with the VP of Digital Transformation and the Director of Business Intelligence as our organization moves to implement new CRM ERP and Field Service Management FSM systems and a new Data Warehouse This is a highly technical position The primary responsibility will be to work with the Director of Business Intelligence on design and implementation of application and data integrations between enterprise applications Design and implementation decisions will be determined by establishing the appropriate data architecture for our needs After the implementation of the new systems future tasks will consist of developing insightful and predictive modeling and reporting of databrppnbspIntegrationbrpulliDeveloping spandatasystem
